item.description:
1. Poland considers shooting down Russian missiles heading to Ukraine  CNN
  2. Hundreds want to join new Ukrainian legion in Poland, Polish media reports  Kyiv Independent
  3. Defence minister urges Ukrainians throughout Europe to join new legion  Reuters
  4. Poland’s Last Few MiG-29s Could Go To War In Ukraine  Forbes
  5. Poland mulls shooting down Russian missiles over Ukraine amid wave of deadly attacks  POLITICO Europe
